name: IceCreamAdventures
description:
a simple game test using slow motion drawing technique developed for a digital cultural center game jam in México City.

Controls

Arrow keys / Joystick = move Player

Spacebar / Joystick button = Jump

Instructions:

Collect 5 coins to drop a big red coin somewhere in map

Collect 10 Red Coins to win,

Alternative link without borders 960x144
